Title: Malilla - Kimball Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Embrace your love for luxury and adventure with the Kimball area rug by Jaipur Living. While this piece boasts a high-end look, it may surprise with its exceptional practicality – this piece is part of the Malilla By Nikki Chu collection, a series of easy-care synthetic area rugs that hold up well to active home lifestyles.

  • Malilla is a collection by star-powered interior designer Nikki Chu, each rug an apt reflection of her signature style that blends glamour with everyday comfort.
  • This contemporary area rug boasts a striking leopard pattern expressed through rich tonal variation. Lustrous fibers capture the light to lend this piece a luminous sheen to elevate the atmosphere of any room.
  • Kimball is a fully synthetic area rug made using a combination of polyester and polypropylene, power loomed for exceptional precision and consistency. This piece is child-friendly and pet-friendly for its resistance against staining and wear.
  • Quickly blot away spills with a dry white cloth. Treat difficult soil with a mixture of water, white vinegar, and a dash of mild soap.

Title: Vera - Saville Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Expressive freeform stripes sweep across the Vera Saville area rug like inky brushstrokes, beautifully handcrafted for artisanal appeal. This exciting design from Nikki Chu by Jaipur Living is made with premium wool for long-lasting performance wherever you love to spend your time.

  • Nikki Chu is a celebrity designer to the stars. Her trend-worthy aesthetic is known for its adventurous patterns and glamorous styling, smartly captured in this collaboration with rugmaker Jaipur Living.
  • Black and white coloration sets a versatile tone for creative coordination possibilities – perfect for anyone with a glamorous, boho chic, or eclectic interior decor theme. Each end is capped with a thick bohemian rug fringe for added texture.
  • Vera collection area rugs are hand-tufted by skilled artisans who place thoughtful care and attention into every detail. The 100% wool rug pile is cropped to a medium height for exquisite comfort with all the advantages of easy upkeep.
  • Vacuum using a suction-only setting, taking care to avoid vacuuming over the fringes. Blot spills immediately using a dry white cloth or a clean sponge.

Title: Calix - Ziazan Area Rug

Breathe life into your favorite space with the fresh global style of this Issa area rug from the Keyara collection from Nikki Chu by Jaipur Living. The Keyara collection melds vintage designs with a modern, global-inspired vibe for an on-trend look full of eye-catching details.

Title: Calix - Terza Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Luxurious texture awaits with the Terza area rug from Nikki Chu by Jaipur Living. This highly adaptable interior accent is part of the Calix collection, a series of glam-forward area rugs made from practical materials that provide dependable performance in active placements.

  • Nikki Chu is an author and celebrity interior designer whose adventurous aesthetic draws inspiration from all over the globe. Jaipur Living has transformed her signature aesthetic into a series of rugs that anyone can enjoy.
  • This contemporary area rug features an irregular stripe design expressed in high-low pile construction, giving the surface a rich topography to admire. Light beige coloration ensures easy coordination with so many decor themes.
  • Each rug in the Calix collection is power-loomed and finished with tightly serged edges. The blended synthetic rug pile is made from polypropylene and polyester for excellent resistance against staining and wear. Low-profile pile allows for easy cleanup.
  • Blot spills immediately using a dry white cloth or a clean sponge. Vacuum using a suction-only setting. Rotate annually.

Title: Vera - Montblanc Area Rug
Body (HTML):
With the Jaipur Vera collection, celebrity designer Nikki Chu draws from global influences to bring an adventurous style to contemporary homes. The alluring Montblanc area rug blends cozy Moroccan aesthetics with sharp modern sensibilities, a standout piece that feels luxurious without sacrificing an ounce of practicality.

  • Strong geometric patterns immediately create an eye-catching first impression, their clean lines tempered by a subtle space-dyed effect for a warm and welcoming look. This delightful Moroccan area rug is capped by braided tassels at each end - a casual complement to a streamlined design.
  • Montblanc is tufted by hand from soft 100% wool over a simple cotton backing. With its pile kept low and dense, this wool area rug proves easy to maintain, a smart match for active lifestyles.
  • Vacuum regularly with the beater brush component disengaged.
  • Made in India.

Body (HTML):
If you'd like to infuse your space with inspiring patterns and versatile colorways, the Raska area rug from Nikki Chu by Jaipur Living's Vera collection could be just what you're looking for. The Vera collection features modern colorways and eye-catching worldly designs for today's homes.

Title: Vera - Rhea Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Glamorous detailing meets laidback bohemian flair with the Rhea area rug from Nikki Chu by Jaipur Living. This striking accent is part of the immaculately handcrafted Vera collection, a series of 100% wool accents made with everyday comfort in mind.

Title: Tajiri - Adana Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Add bold and versatile styling to your favorite outdoor seating spot with this beautiful Adana area rug from the Tajiri collection by Nikki Chu. It pairs perfectly with most outdoor seating and dining sets thanks to large-scale global motifs.

  • This beautiful area rug features neutral colorways that can help anchor any space. The grey colorway comes to life through the linear details and captivating trellis pattern.
  • Adana features looped and flatwoven polypropylene, which adds depth and dimension to the 0.25" pile.
  • This high-performance indoor/outdoor rug features a weather-resistant finish and lasting durability, perfect for any interior or exterior space. A rug pad is recommended.
  • Proper care will add years to the life of your rug—clean stains with mild soap and rinse with clean water or a garden hose. For indoor use, vacuum regularly with the beater bar off.

Title: Sanaa - Asani Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Make a statement in any room with this stunning Asani area rug from the Sanaa collection by Nikki Chu. Inspired by African motifs, this area rug features a beautiful combination of eye-catching patterns and versatile, easy-to-decorate-with colors.

  • The Asani area rug features a distressed ikat-inspired design with decorative fringe trim and a light colorway, creating texture and a pleasing vintage allure.
  • This power-loomed area rug features a luxuriously dense 0.4" pile that's made from a soft and durable blend of polyester and polypropylene. A rug pad is recommended.
  • Thanks to its durable pile, this area rug is an ideal accent for high-traffic spaces with pets or children.
  • Maintain your rug by cleaning spills immediately and vacuuming regularly with the beater bar off. Clean with a mild soap mixed with equal parts of white vinegar and water.

Title: Sanaa - Lehana Area Rug
Body (HTML):
With the Lehana area rug by Jaipur Living, painterly patterns allow you to decorate with artistic flair anywhere in the home. This piece is part of the Sanaa By Nikki Chu collection – an expressive series that draws inspiration from African motifs reimagined to suit contemporary home themes.

  • Designer-to-the-stars Nikki Chu blends glamour and global sensibilities with the Sanaa collection. This series is luxuriously comfortable yet perfectly practical for smart go-to appeal.
  • Select from two colorways to best suit your interior environment. This piece offers the aesthetics of a casual bohemian rug, made with a short yet sumptuously soft pile that is suitable for bustling living areas and quiet bedrooms alike.
  • This blended synthetic area rug is power loomed from a combination of polypropylene and polyester, both highly resistant against everyday wear. It's an ideal choice for homes with pets, children, or high levels of foot traffic.
  • Vacuum as needed using a suction-only setting, without using any type of brush roll or beater bar component. Blot spills with a dry white cloth.
